title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“You don't cut off your nose to spoil your face.” [Quoted in The New York Times, Business Section, September 6, 1981. Submitted by Paul M. Lloyd, Secane, Pennsylvania. Indeed, why bother otherwise?]
